title: How to Make Dirt Pudding Mix in a Mug

steps.headline: Combine the ingredients in a small plastic zipped bag.
Line the inside of a coffee mug with tissue paper.
Add the plastic bag with a small whisk in the mug.
Attach a decorative tag to the mug.
steps.description:
Write down the following directions on the tag:
Thoroughly mix the mug contents with 1/2 cup cold milk. Chill in the refrigerator and allow the pudding to set for at least 10 minutes.
